name: ReportingCampaign
desc: The response to a request to fetch campaign-level reports.

items.name: adChannelType
items.desc: The channel type of ad in a campaign.See AdChannelType for enum descriptions.You can use the EQUALS selector Condition operator with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: app
items.desc: The name of the app and the adamId.

items.name: campaignId
items.desc: The identifier for the campaign.You can use the EQUALS, IN, and STARTSWITH selector Condition operators with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: campaignName
items.desc: The unique name of the campaign.You can use the EQUALS, IN, and STARTSWITH selector Condition operators with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: campaignStatus
items.desc: The status of the campaign.See CampaignStatus for enum descriptions.You can use the EQUALS selector Condition operator with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: countriesOrRegions
items.desc: The App Store geoterritories where you’re promoting your app. This field requires an ISO country code value for the locations where you’re promoting. The default value is US.You can use the EQUALS, CONTAINS_ANY, and CONTAINS_ALL selector Condition operators with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: countryOrRegionServingStateReasons
items.desc: The map of reasons that returns when a campaign isn’t running.

items.name: dailyBudget
items.desc: The daily budget amount available to the campaign.

items.name: deleted
items.desc: The indicator of whether the campaign is soft-deleted.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: displayStatus
items.desc: The status of the campaign. The status resolves according to servingStatus and additional criteria.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the object.

items.name: orgId
items.desc: The identifier of the organization that owns the campaign. Your orgId is the same as your account in the Apple Search Ads UI.

items.name: servingStateReasons
items.desc: A list of reasons that displays when a campaign can’t run.See CampaignServingStateReasons for enum descriptions.

items.name: servingStatus
items.desc: The status of the campaign.You can use the EQUALS selector Condition operator with Get Campaign-Level Reports.

items.name: supplySources
items.desc: The supply source of ads in a campaign.See SupplySource for enum descriptions and validations.You can use the CONTAINS_ANY, CONTAINS_ALL, and EQUALS selector Condition operators with Get Campaign-Level Reports.
